forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The morning sun graces Downtown San Francisco, warming the air with a gentle glow, though a distinct chill lingers, reminding one of the coastal embrace this city knows so well. As the day unfolds, temperatures hover around a comfortable 66 degrees, gradually easing into the mid-60s as afternoon approaches. A brisk west-southwest wind dances through the streets, sending occasional gusts that encourage the trees to sway cheerfully and perhaps even tousle the hair of the unwary.

While the sky presents an inviting palette of blues, whispers of cloudiness roll in for the evening, hinting at a transition from the day's brightness to a cooler, more subdued ambiance. The cityscape, radiating clarity, features glimpses of the Golden Gate, its magnificence set against a backdrop of light cloud cover, suggesting that today is one for exploration. Dress in layers to accommodate the shifting temperatures—perhaps a light sweater or jacket for later. With the backdrop of pleasing weather, an afternoon stroll along the Embarcadero could offer the perfect blend of rhythmic waves and urban vibrancy, or a coffee at a neighborhood café might provide a moment of quiet reflection before twilight settles in.
